dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1046 IH: Transit Tax Parity Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton (for herself, Mr. Beyer, and Mr. Connolly) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the rule providing parity for the exclusion from income for employer-provided mass transit and parking benefits.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Transit Tax Parity Act of 2015.

section.header: Parity for exclusion from income for employer-provided mass transit and parking benefits made permanent

subsection.text: Section 132(f)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking $100 in subparagraph (A) and inserting $175, and

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to months beginning after December 31, 2014.
